alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Crawford County through 515 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Linesville, or 12 miles west of Meadville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. Very heavy rainfall can also be expected with thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Cambridge Springs, Linesville, Harmonsburg, Adamsville, Canadohta Lake, Pymatuning North, Pymatuning Central, Atlantic, Saegertown, Conneautville, Conneaut Lake, Springboro, Blooming Valley, Venango, Woodcock, Conneaut Lakeshore, Geneva and Hartstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
